sentences.en: ...a man who had refused after torture to recant his heresy.
sentences.cn: ...遭受酷刑后仍拒绝放弃其异教信仰的一名男子。

sentences.en: Could your recant the unsatisfied call to make the our investigation more convenient?
sentences.cn: 你方可否把不满意的电话退回,以便我们检查.

sentences.en: Do you plan to recant on your deathbed?
sentences.cn: 你在临死时会不会放弃信仰.

sentences.en: Editorials would demand that he either recant or retire from public life.
sentences.cn: 社论会提出要求,他要么宣布放弃信仰,要么从公共生活中隐退.

sentences.en: However, life would be pleasanter if Rhett would recant his heresies.
sentences.cn: 不过,如果瑞德放其他的那套异端邪说, 生活就会惬意得多.

sentences.en: The torture can not make the man recant.
sentences.cn: 拷问者不能使那个人放弃他的主张.

sentences.en: They could not make him recant.
sentences.cn: 他们无法使他改变自己的意见.

sentences.en: Though he was forced to change his religion, he recant.
sentences.cn: 虽然强迫他改变宗教信仰, 但他绝不改变.

sentences.en: Though he was forced to change his religion,he would not recant.
sentences.cn: 虽然强迫他改变宗教信仰，但他绝不改变。

sentences.en: Unless you recant your confession, you will be punished severely.
sentences.cn: 除非你收回你的供词, 你将严厉惩罚.

sentences.en: What if I had to get you recant?
sentences.cn: 如果我不得不让你放弃信仰?

sentences.en: White House officials ordered Williams to recant.
sentences.cn: 白宫官员命令威廉斯公开宣布放弃自己的观点。

trans.tran_en: to say publicly that you no longer have a political or religious belief that you had before

trans.tran_cn: 撤回（声明），放弃（信仰或主张）
